title: SubToMe - Universal Follow Button
name: subtome
description: SubToMe makes it easy for people to follow web sites, because browsers don't.
author: Sören Hentzschel

de.description: SubToMe macht es einfach für Menschen, Webseiten zu folgen, weil Browser dies nicht tun.

en.description: SubToMe makes it easy for people to follow web sites, because browsers don't.
